summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SL&A civil engineering website. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), frontend public pages working perfectly, but admin authentication has frontend-backend integration issues.

integration_issues.issue: Admin login/registration fails on frontend despite backend APIs working correctly
integration_issues.symptoms: Login form submission returns 401/400 errors, no successful redirect to dashboard

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, stats, services sections
All navigation between public pages (About, Services, Projects, Blog, Contact)
All backend APIs working (15/15 tests passed)
Public API endpoints return data correctly
Contact inquiry submission to backend successful
Admin CRUD operations work via backend API
Google Maps integration working on contact page
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin authentication frontend-backend integration. Backend APIs work (verified), but frontend login/registration forms are getting 401/400 errors. Check AuthContext.js and api.js for proper error handling and request formatting.
